sections.text:
3500. If a department within the California Health and Human Services Agency has received approval of an operational state plan by a federal agency, or has applied and has been approved for a waiver from a federal law or federal regulation, the department shall make any and all approved plans and waivers available to the public by publishing a hyperlink to that information on the homepage of the departmentâ€™s Internet Web site.

(Added by Stats. 2015, Ch. 296, Sec. 2. (AB 294) Effective January 1, 2016.)

(Added by Stats. 2015, Ch. 296, Sec. 2. (AB 294) Effective January 1, 2016.)
